title: Maximum kinetic energy by light frequency graph

content.description:
Following questions relate to the photoelectric effect. For each question, choose an answer from the following graphs.
(A) 
(B) 
(C)
(D)

content.question: Which graph shows the maximum kinetic energy of the emitted electrons versus the frequency of the light?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
